name: createToken
description: Create token by 'tokenType' and additional token parameters

action.description: For type=ACTION only; defines token action to be perfromed

apiKeyRole.description: For tokenType=APIKEY only (default: ROLE_APIKEY_LICENSEE); defines token RoleID

cancelURL.description: For tokenType=SHOP only; take customers to this URL when they cancel their checkout

cancelURLTitle.description: For tokenType=SHOP only; shop link title for cancel checkout process

licenseTemplateNumber.description: For tokenType=SHOP only; identifies LicenseTemplate that will be assigned to the shop token

licenseeNumber.description: For tokenType=SHOP or type=ACTION only (mandatory); identifies Licensee that will be assigned to the shop token

predefinedShoppingItem.description: For tokenType=SHOP only; identifies Shopping Item name that will be shown to the customer

privateKey.description:
For tokenType=APIKEY only (optional); defines PrivateKey to be used with the validate method
Please Note: PrivateKey need to be provided as one line without spaces

productNumber.description: For tokenType=SHOP only (mandatory); identifies Product that will be assigned to the shop token

successURL.description: For tokenType=SHOP only; take customers to this URL when they finish checkout

successURLTitle.description: For tokenType=SHOP only; shop link title for successful checkout process

type.description: For tokenType=DEFAULT only; action type to be set
